languages.text: {n}Монахи долгое время сетовали на итоги прений. Истовые верующие не смирились, и еще долгое время в их рядах шли дискуссии и жаркие споры о том, что Горнило было передано под опеку техножрецов несправедливо.{/n}

{n}The monks continued to lament the outcome of the deliberations long after they had ended. The devout believers refused to accept their defeat, and for a long time after, many discussions and heated debates were held regarding the Crucible being unjustly entrusted into the Tech-Priests' care.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Монахи долгое время сетовали на итоги прений. Истовые верующие не смирились, и еще долгое время в их рядах шли дискуссии и жаркие споры о том, что Горнило было передано под опеку техножрецов несправедливо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The monks had lamented the outcome of the debate for quite a while. The devout believers did not accept the results, and thus there were many discussions and heated debates held about the Crucible unjustly leaving the convent of the Hammer for a long time.{/n}

{n}The monks had lamented the outcome of the debate for quite a while. The devout believers did not accept the results, and thus there were many discussions and heated debates held about the Crucible unjustly leaving the convent of the Hammer for a long time.{/n}

The devout believers refused to accept their defeat, and for a long time after, many discussions and heated debates were held regarding the Crucible being unjustly entrusted into the Tech-Priests' care.{/n}

The devout believers refused to accept their defeat, and for a long time after, many discussions and heated debates were held regarding the Crucible being unjustly entrusted into the Tech-Priests' care.{/n}

The devout believers refused to accept their defeat, and for a long time after, many discussions and heated debates were held regarding the Crucible being unjustly entrusted into the Tech-Priests' care.{/n}

{n}The monks continued to lament the outcome of the deliberations long after they had ended. The devout believers refused to accept their defeat, and for a long time after, many discussions and heated debates were held regarding the Crucible being unjustly entrusted into the Tech-Priests' care.{/n}

languages.text: {n}即便是审议结束很久之后，重锤修会的修士仍对结果垂头丧气。虔诚的信徒们拒绝承认这场失败，在接下来很长一段时间，他们就“熔炉被有失公允地托付给技术神甫”这个问题进行了无数次激烈的讨论。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The monks continued to lament the outcome of the deliberations long after they had ended. The devout believers refused to accept their defeat, and for a long time after, many discussions and heated debates were held regarding the Crucible being unjustly entrusted into the Tech-Priests' care.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}即便是审议结束很久之后，重锤修会的修士仍对结果垂头丧气。虔诚的信徒们拒绝承认这场失败，在接下来很长一段时间，他们就“熔炉被有失公允地托付给技术祭司”这个问题进行了无数次激烈的讨论。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los monjes siguieron lamentando el resultado de las deliberaciones mucho después de que hubieran terminado. Los devotos creyentes se negaron a aceptar su derrota y, durante mucho tiempo, se celebraron numerosas discusiones y acalorados debates sobre el hecho de que el Crisol hubiera sido confiado injustamente al cuidado de los tecnosacerdotes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The monks continued to lament the outcome of the deliberations long after they had ended. The devout believers refused to accept their defeat, and for a long time after, many discussions and heated debates were held regarding the Crucible being unjustly entrusted into the Tech-Priests' care.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los monjes siguieron lamentando el resultado de las deliberaciones mucho después de que hubieran terminado. Los devotos creyentes se negaron a aceptar su derrota y, durante mucho tiempo, se celebraron numerosas discusiones y acalorados debates sobre el hecho de que el Crisol hubiera sido confiado injustamente al cuidado de los tecnosacerdotes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}修道士たちは、審議が終わった後も、長くその結果を嘆き続けた。敬虔な信者たちは敗北を受け入れることを拒み、その後も長期にわたって、坩堝の管理が技術司祭に不当に託されたことについて、多くの話し合いと激論が交わされた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The monks continued to lament the outcome of the deliberations long after they had ended. The devout believers refused to accept their defeat, and for a long time after, many discussions and heated debates were held regarding the Crucible being unjustly entrusted into the Tech-Priests' care.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}修道士たちは、審議が終わった後も、長くその結果を嘆き続けた。敬虔な信者たちは敗北を受け入れることを拒み、その後も長期にわたって、坩堝の管理が技術司祭に不当に託されたことについて、多くの話し合いと激論が交わされた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les moines continuent à pester contre l'issue des délibérations longtemps après leur conclusion. Les croyants dévoués n'acceptent jamais leur défaite et les discussions et débats animés ne cessent jamais réellement ; tous restent convaincus que le Creuset a été injustement confié aux technoprêtres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The monks continued to lament the outcome of the deliberations long after they had ended. The devout believers refused to accept their defeat, and for a long time after, many discussions and heated debates were held regarding the Crucible being unjustly entrusted into the Tech-Priests' care.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les moines continuent à pester contre l'issue des délibérations longtemps après leur conclusion. Les croyants dévoués n'acceptent jamais leur défaite et les discussions et débats animés ne cessent jamais réellement ; tous restent convaincus que le Creuset a été injustement confié aux technoprêtres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Mönche beklagten den Ausgang der Verhandlungen noch lange nach deren Abschluss. Die frommen Gläubigen weigerten sich, ihre Niederlage zu akzeptieren, und noch lange, lange danach gab es regelmäßig Diskussionen und erregte Debatten darüber, dass der Tiegel ungerechtfertigterweise den Techpriestern übergeben worden war.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The monks continued to lament the outcome of the deliberations long after they had ended. The devout believers refused to accept their defeat, and for a long time after, many discussions and heated debates were held regarding the Crucible being unjustly entrusted into the Tech-Priests' care.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Keşişler, müzakerelerin ardından bile sonuçlarına dair uzunca bir süre yakınmaya devam ettir. Sofular, yenilgilerini kabul etmeyi reddettiler. Ardından bir hayli uzun bir zaman boyunca Pota'nın Tekno Rahiplerin gözetimine adil olmayan bir şekilde bırakıldığına dair pek çok müzakere ve hararetli tartışma döndü.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The monks continued to lament the outcome of the deliberations long after they had ended. The devout believers refused to accept their defeat, and for a long time after, many discussions and heated debates were held regarding the Crucible being unjustly entrusted into the Tech-Priests' care.{/n}
